targets.query: select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and "device" != 'rootfs'  and $timeFilter
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("inodes_used") / inodes_total FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rwB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rwB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rkB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rkB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_established)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: cpu
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu"

list.label: interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "network" WITH KEY = "device"

list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device"
